item.title: Pure Heart - How Can I Get Over - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song How Can I Get Over by Pure Heart from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D.

item.title: Pure Heart - Crazy Without You - Key of G - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Crazy Without You by Pure Heart from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Bm7, C, D, G.
